Forty Acres Fresh Market runs a residential produce box delivery service. Open year round - check website for details

Ordering: Orders are placed online for weekly, biweekly, or monthly subscriptions or one time deliveries. Minimum order for delivery is $10. SNAP payment is made at the time of delivery. 

Delivery: Sunday, Monday, Wednesday, and Fridays (barring any service changes due to holidays or inclement weather) throughout the city and select I-290 western suburbs based on zip code.

Mobile Farmers Market is stocked with UGC farm produce, partners’ produce and value added goods, and supplemented with wholesale produce. FMMM stops at partner site locations throughout the week and for community health interventions to improve overall community health through food access, recipes and nutrition, and awareness of food systems

For more information about where the market will be, see our schedule at

LUCSA stands for Local Unified Community Supported Agriculture. We deliver a box of locally-sourced produce weekly throughout the year in the greater Chicagoland area.
LUCSA signup language: Sign-ups are now open year round! To sign up go to our website: theurbancanopy.org/csa Questions can be emailed to LUCSA@theurbancanopy.org
May - Oct market also runs on Wednesday from 7:00 AM - 11:00 AM

Days: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday
Notes: Our mobile farmers market (i.e. 'Muzz Moblie') is used whenever we have excess produce from our 'Garfield Park Neighborhood Market'. It is usually ran on the Sunday, Monday, or Tuesday after the market.

Overview:
Top Box Market is an online grocery market that creates access to healthy, affordable food. We offer fresh fruits and vegetables, meats, seafood, and poultry, dairy, grains, meal kits, and more. To make grocery shopping easier for our community, we deliver for no added fee across Cook County every week. SNAP Shoppers double their dollar with the Link Match program, available in partnership with Experimental Station at Top Box Market. 

How It Works for Customers: Link Match at Top Box Market
-First, purchase any Top Box Market products with a Link Card. Shop online at topboxfoods.com or with support from our Customer Service team at 312-527-7890. When you place your first order, you’ll create an account on our website where you can view your Link Match and order history. 
-EBT/SNAP spending is matched dollar-for-dollar every order, earning you Link Match dollars to save money on your next Top Box Market order. Log into your Top Box Market account on our website and click the Link Match button in the corner to view your available Link Match dollars.
-Link Match dollars can be redeemed for products with fresh fruits and vegetables. To view the available options, go to topboxfoods.com/collections/linkmatch 
-When you’re ready to shop, add the products you’d like to order to your cart. At checkout, click Link Match to redeem the amount you’d like to save on the order. When you redeem, your Link Match dollars become a code valid for any products with fresh fruits or vegetables. Click “Discounts” to apply your new code to your order. Link Match can be redeemed in different amounts from $12.50 to $60, so you can use the right amount for the eligible products in your order.
-Your order will be delivered to your home on your chosen delivery day, so you can enjoy nutritious, fresh fruits and vegetables!

*Link Match dollars do not expire, so customers at Top Box Market can use or save them at their convenience.
*Top Box Foods Customer Service support is available in English and Spanish for customers looking for information or ordering support.

Partner Program Name: Urban Growers Collective Collective Supported Agriculture/CSA
Notes:
UGC’s Collective Supported Agriculture Shares provide opportunity for community members to purchase a weekly share of our produce throughout the growing season:
Spring: April 9 - April 30
Early Summer: May 14 - June 25
Late Summer: July 9 - Aug 20
Fall: Sept 10 - Oct 29
Early Winter: Nov 5 - Nov 26 
Share holders receive a selection of UGC’s harvest and partner’s produce for either at-home delivery (within Chicago, through Dion’s Chicago Dream) or pick up at farm and partner locations. Half shares are available along with the ability to sign up for all seasons.
